subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=衣00}}

# [[clothing]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ころも|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Synonyms
Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|きぬ}}

Likely cognate with {{m|ja|絹|tr=kinu||silk}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Alternatively, may also be a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=きぬ|着|tr1=ki|t1=wearing|pos1=the {{ja-etym-renyokei|nodot=1|着る}} ''kiru'', “to wear”|布|tr2=nu|t2=cloth|pos2=shortened from normal reading ''nuno''}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|きぬ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ぎ}}

The [[rendaku]] form of {{m|ja|着|tr=ki}}, the {{ja-etym-renyokei|nodot=1|着る}} (''kiru'', “to wear”).<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ぎ}}

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|ぎ}}

# [[clothes]], [[clothing]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Only found as the latter element in compounds. More commonly spelled {{m|ja|着}}.
